name: oracle-polymarket
description: Prediction markets dashboard powered by Polymarket

scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.prod: npm run kill && npm run build && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm start --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.backend: npm run kill -- 3001 && npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.frontend: npm run kill -- 3000 && npm run dev --prefix frontend
